title: 6-3-4 snowballing Kha'Zix - 0-5-3 Miss Fortune.
body:
"Might take the red I'm getting pinged b from, since I have 150 games so I know what pings mean and I don't care and I'll just act dumb about it later".

Why be dumb? Like why just refuse to listen?

Completely f*cked the whole game for me just because c0cky, arrogant or having a giggle.

GJ being a f-ckwit. Imma go solo play and you can have your f-cking giggles with your red buff that you feed within 20 seconds.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Firstly , you need to realise winning and losing is a part of the game mechanic . No one can win forever and no one can lose forever ; which is like wise for winning lane or having good KDA, most ADC do that even though they seem weaker then you but it's the little thing that you shouldn't care about
This one game won't matter to you in a week, don't get heated over little thing , being salty is fine but you need to get over some small/minor incident that happens in the game and move on with your life

Everyone thinks they're entitled to buffs. So many times I have been jg, clearing the side of jg my red is on, ready to get blue, only to find my mid laner already there and waiting (for the first blue buff of the game).
Someone is mad haha. Oce has got to have the most salt out of all the servers.
